items.sentence: Tom used to come over every Monday evening and play music with me.
I don\'t think that anyone suspected that you weren\'t really Tom.
I just don\'t want to have people thinking that I\'m not sociable.
The first thing you\'ll usually want to do is check the oil level.
Tom drove back to his house to get something that he\'d forgotten.
Going to Australia is one of the things Tom wants to do next year.
Tom caught Mary trying to steam open an envelope addressed to him.
I find it hard to imagine that anyone could possibly believe this.
I could hardly keep from laughing when I saw Tom and Mary dancing.
Tom used to play second base for his high school\'s baseball team.
